games.title: Your Obby Size
games.description:
Parkour and size control with secrets and surprises! Jump, run, and reach new heights in this thrilling game! Avoid lava and conquer challenges from easy to extreme!
Collect enough trophies to unlock secret paths, access new locations, and get unique character skins!
Beware of monsters guarding certain areas!
Find shortcuts to the top! Show everyone you're a true parkour master!

games.title: Speed per Click: Obby
games.description:
"Speed per Click: Obby" ‚Äì An exciting clicker-speed simulator in the style of obby and blocky games!  

üîπ Key Features:  

‚úÖ Dynamic clicker ‚Äì Earn speed with every click and accelerate to incredible levels! 
‚úÖ Obby-style challenges ‚Äì Overcome parkour tracks with jumps and tricky maneuvers, just like in obby games! 
‚úÖ Progress & rewards ‚Äì Collect wins, unlock new locations, and upgrade your skills! 
‚úÖ Pets ‚Äì Buy pets to increase speed per click and beat levels faster! 
‚úÖ Rebirth system ‚Äì Perform rebirths to gain bonuses and speed up again!  

üåç Play in the best traditions of obby and blocky parkour ‚Äì It has everything: clicker mechanics, parkour, adrenaline, and fun!  

üî• Ready for the challenge? Click, jump, and become the champion of Speed per Click: Obby!
games.howToPlayText:
Computers: 
- WASD - control the character. 
- Space - jump.  

Mobile devices: 
- Joystick - control the character. 
- Button in the lower right corner - jump. 
- To rotate the camera, swipe the screen.

games.title: Robbie: Draw your Sword
games.description: Enter the exciting realm of Robbie: Draw your Sword, a dynamic online adventure game. Gather swords, complete challenges, and level up to transform your character. Enjoy this free game on mobile or desktop, unlocking various outfits, pets, and abilities. Are you prepared to become the ultimate warrior?
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop:
WASD - Movement
LKM - Swing and draw sword üí™
Spacebar - Jump
PCM and mouse movement - Rotate the camera

üì± Smartphone:
Move - Joystick on the left side of the screen
Camera rotation - Finger movements on the right side of the screen
Click on the screen - Swing and draw sword üí™

games.title: Obby: Dumb or Genius IQ Test
games.description: Welcome to Obby: Dumb or Genius IQ Test! üß†‚ú® ‚Äì the ultimate game where intelligence is key! Test your brainpower by completing fun mini-games üïπÔ∏è, taking on exciting challenges üèÜ, and engaging in PvP duels ü§∫ to earn IQ points and level up. Collect IQ scattered across the map, win mini-games for extra boosts, or spin the wheel of fortune for random IQ rewards. The more IQ you gain, the higher your status in the game, with trophies üèÜ that can be exchanged for cool pets üêæ. Prove you''''''''''''''''re the smartest player and rise to the top of the leaderboard. Ready to show off your genius? Play now and take your IQ to the next level!
games.howToPlayText:
Controls:
The game can be played using either keyboard or touch controls. On the computer, use the arrow keys or WASD to move. Interact with objects by left-clicking or placing the character in a highlighted circle. Press space to jump. On the phone, the touch controls are intuitive: use the left joystick to move and the right button to jump. To interact with objects, simply tap or place the character in the circle.

games.description: Dive into the exciting world of Obby Pet Simulator X, where you collect unique pets. Open eggs to summon rare creatures, break obstacles, and upgrade your skills. Enjoy this mesmerizing experience online for free on your mobile device or computer.

games.title: Obby Easy Grow!
games.description: Test your skills in a race against time!Adjust your character's size dynamically using the on-screen slider or the mouse wheel to navigate through obstacles and challenges. Hold the right mouse button to freely rotate the camera and explore your surroundings. Can you master the mechanics and complete the game before time runs out?
games.howToPlayText:
PC:
Shift - show cursor
WASD - move.
Space - jump.
TAB - pause.
F - push the enemy
Mouse wheel forward/backward - change size

Phone:
Use the game interface

games.title: Moto Obby
games.description: Join the exciting world of Moto Obby, where your motorbike skills face intense challenges. Overcome tricky hazards like swinging hammers and sharp spikes in a quest for victory. Test your reflexes across various levels in this thrilling online game, available on phones and computers.
games.howToPlayText:
Use the arrows ‚¨ÜÔ∏è‚¨áÔ∏è or "WS" to move and ‚¨ÖÔ∏è‚û°Ô∏è or "AD" to spin.
Sometimes you‚Äôll need to slow down, and other times you‚Äôll need to speed up to win. Try different tactics.
If your bike gets stuck, press ‚¨ÖÔ∏è‚û°Ô∏è or "AD" to hop!

games.title: Obby The Legendary Dragon
games.description:
An exciting and addictive pet catching simulator for pokemon lovers. Travel through different roblox worlds and a lot of leveling heroes in one place!

Collect health, upgrade your hero to explore the most amazing worlds of this game. Catch pets in battles, hatch them from cases and eggs, buy and exchange them to get the strongest helpers and friends. Earn money and upgrade your Obby character with the help of ranks and titles.

games.title: Obby Pizza Delivery
games.description: Become a delivery boy in the maze and deliver pizzas to the locals. Rent a scooter to move faster. Pick a bigger bag so you can take more orders at a time and deliver even more pizzas. Complete orders, increase your reputation and open new zones with residents!
games.howToPlayText:
üèÉ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Pick up orders at the pizzeria and deliver them to the residents
üõ¥ Rent a scooter to move faster
üåü Upgrade your reputation and open new zones

games.title: School Escape Obby
games.description:
Dive into the thrilling world of School Escape Obby ‚Äî a vibrant online game in roblox style with stunning graphics and diverse locations!
Tackle unique challenges in each zone, from school corridors to mysterious dungeons. Customize your character with hundreds of stylish skins and compete with friends in multiplayer mode. Every obstacle tests your agility and wit: jump, dodge, and solve puzzles to escape the school! Perfect for all skill levels, the game combines fast-paced platforming with creative level design. Regular updates, eye-catching visuals, and competitive leaderboards make this game a top choice for fans of obstacle courses. Join millions of players worldwide and prove your skills!
games.howToPlayText:
Escape from school, play for time

Controls on PC:

Shift - show cursor
WASD - move.
Space - jump.
TAB - pause.
F - push enemy
E - interact with objects (you can also interact with them by clicking the mouse)

On phones: on-screen controls

games.title: Obby Royal races in flight
games.description: Obby: Royal Races in Flight is an exciting online racing game where players can unlock fast cars and navigate challenging courses. Available on multiple platforms, it features stunning 3D graphics, opportunities for car upgrades, and fun for all ages, including exclusive options for premium members.

games.title: Obby: Warriors of The Sword
games.description:
Become a hero in Obby: Warriors of The Sword! Collect powerful swords, defeat enemies and unlock new abilities! Go through rebirth and become a legend. Get stronger, pump up your hero and become the best in this exciting game!

Key Game Features:

‚öîÔ∏è Epic Battles: Upgrade your hero, unlock new abilities and fight unique enemies! üïπÔ∏è

üí• Sword and Artifact Collection: Buy, upgrade and collect different swords to create the strongest hero with powerful weapons! üó°Ô∏èüíé

üí™ Allies and Reborn: Make loyal allies and go through rebirth, becoming even stronger and opening new battle opportunities. ü§ùüîÑ

üòé Endless customizations: You can choose from a variety of skins, pets and jewelry to make your hero unique and truly stylish! üé®üêæ‚ú®

üíªDesktop:

üì± Smartphone:

games.title: Your Obby Parkour
games.description:
Enter a thrilling world of non-stop challenges! Run, jump, dodge, and conquer in the ultimate parkour platformer! 
Survive crazy levels ‚Äî from burning lava and icy slides to water traps and mysterious portals. Watch out for trampolines, spinning traps, and tons of hidden paths!

Play with friends and travel through fun regions ‚Äî from simple to brutally hard! Discover the hidden little dragon, collect trophies, and unlock secret shortcuts and bonus zones!

Be careful of:
Deadly skeletons
Lava-filled volcanoes
Slippery ice paths
Horror mazes where it's easy to get lost!

Ready to be a true parkour master? Find the fastest paths, conquer extreme stages, and show the world your skills!

Perfect for fans of obby-style maps, parkour games, secrets, adventures, and multiplayer fun!
games.howToPlayText:
The goal: get to the end.

Control:
WASD - movement.
Space bar - jump.
TAB - pause.
Shift - cursor.
Mouse wheel - zoom in/out.

On the phone:
Use the game interface.
